topics.title: Pointing
topics.description: Use your mouse to point at the 🖱️ emoji. Click when it turns green.

topics.title: Single Click
topics.description: Click once on the 🖱️ emoji when it appears at different positions.

topics.title: Double Click
topics.description: Double-click on the 🖱️ emoji when it appears.

topics.title: Drag and Drop
topics.description: Click and drag the 🖱️ emoji to the target square.

topics.title: Point and Click
topics.description: Point to the 🐭 emoji and click once. Repeat 5 times.

topics.title: Follow the Mouse
topics.description: Move your mouse along the path of arrows 🡆🡇🡄🡅 and click on each emoji.

topics.title: Click Any Shape
topics.description: Click on the shape that appears on the screen as fast as you can.

topics.title: Right Click Practice
topics.description: Right-click on the shape that appears.

topics.title: Drag Shapes
topics.description: Drag each shape to its matching colored target.

topics.title: Fast Click
topics.description: Click on moving shapes as quickly as you can.

topics.title: Drag and Rotate
topics.description: Drag shapes to their targets and rotate them to match orientation.

topics.title: Advanced Drag
topics.description: Drag multiple shapes simultaneously to targets.

topics.title: Precision Click
topics.description: Click on small shapes appearing quickly at random positions.

topics.title: Combo Click
topics.description: Click on shapes in the correct sequence.

topics.title: Right & Left Combo
topics.description: Perform a combo of left and right clicks on the shapes.

topics.title: Drag & Drop Combo
topics.description: Drag and drop multiple shapes in correct order.

topics.title: Speed Challenge
topics.description: Click and drag shapes as fast as possible within 10 seconds.

topics.title: Master Challenge
topics.description: Complete all previous mouse exercises in a sequence.
